networks
Class AlgorithmNeuralGas

java.lang.Object
  networks.Algorithm
      networks.AlgorithmNeuralGas
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public final class AlgorithmNeuralGas
extends Algorithm

Title: Neural Gas

Description: The Neural Gas Algorithm

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2004

Company: University of Hertfordshire

Version:
1.0 19 to 26 February 2003 First Release, 1.1 01 June 2004 Graph Imnplementation, 1.2 06 July 2004 Re-implementation with jdsl api, 1.3 08 July 2004 Re-implemented with own graph class. Added Error class as the arraylists of errors and nodes were not in sync?, 1.4 21 September 2004 Changed the observable functionality, as the Graph needs to be observable, at a different rate to the input observer., 1.5 14 October 2004 Removed all references to output rate - the algorithm now notifies all registered observers on a change to the graph., 1.6 04 January 2005 Removed a large amount of runtime error checking to speed things up, 1.7 10 February 2005 Moved initialisation into init()
Author:
K.A.J.Doherty@herts.ac.uk
